DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the potential effect of CP 690,550 on the pharmacokinetics of metformin, a probe drug for organic cationic transport.
DOC.brief_title: Effect Of CP-690,550 On The Pharmacokinetics Of Metformin In Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Adult healthy male and/or female (of non child bearing potential) subjects. Subjects with clinically significant systemic and laboratory abnormalities. Subjects with clinically significant infections within the past 3 months. Women of childbearing potential.
